The no cd crack & install doesn't work, so here's how I got it to work:

Mount "Age of Empires II.toast" and copy everything in the Age of Empires II folder to wherever you want it to be. Then burn that "Age of Empires II" to a cd (I used toast: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3731014/Toast_Titanium_8.0.1.137_(UB)_%5BRETAIL%5D___Serial) and use it to play.

NO CD CRACK INFO:

I am on 10.4.11 and the crack works just fine:

1. Rename the Age of Empires II no cd.smi file to Age of Empires II no cd.dmg
2. Unmount the install image file
3. Mount the NO-CD .dmg file
4. Play
5. Next time - be creative before whining. (Think Different - you know?) This took me 1 minute to figure out playing around.. :P

Xa2TheV and mredpopo - hold down on the command key when you open the Age of Empires II application.  This will bring up the preferences for the game - set the colors to 256 colors instead of 16-bit and then disable the intro movies.  This will allow you to play the game on your MacBook.
